headline: Software giant ends pursuit of Mike Lynch ally in £3bn fraud case
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) has ended its pursuit of one of Mike Lynch’s key lieutenants over claims he defrauded the tech giant in an $11bn (£8.3bn) deal struck more than a decade ago.
